sources.name: dailyChanges
sources.script:
source(output(
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> dailyChanges

sources.name: targetFile
sources.script:
source(output(
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> targetFile

sinks.name: sinkTargetFile
sinks.script:
RemoveDeletes sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['moviesoutnew.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		MovieId,
		Title,
		Genre,
		Year,
		Rating,
		RottenTom
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkTargetFile

transformations.name: DedupeUpdates
transformations.script:
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(MovieIdDupe = MovieId,
		Action),
	MovieId = first(MovieId),
		Title = first(Title),
		Genre = first(Genre),
		Year = first(Year),
		Rating = first(Rating),
		RottenTom = first(RottenTom)) ~> DedupeUpdates
